category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Cfg0RuleDateOffset
preference.preference_description: By default the Configurator Perspective uses the Revision Rule specified with preference "Cfg0DefaultRevisionRule". The system automatically sets a Rule Date for this Revision Rule. This Preference "Cfg0RuleDateOffset" specifies the offset (in seconds) to add to last midnight when setting this Rule Date. If the offset is 0 (the default value for this preference) the Rule Date will be set to today 12:00 AM. If a preference value is 21600 then the Rule Date is set to today 06:00 AM (midnight + 21600 seconds).If the offset calculation returns a future time or a time that is more than 24 h in the past the system will subtract or add days until the calculated time is less than 24 h ago.
